content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
The best Premium KBBQ place in KTLA so far. The meats are really juicy and high quality. Service is 10/10. The servers are very friendly. They also cook the meat for you and they really know how to cook it to perfection. We also got a free egg souffl√© for waiting. We will definitely be back. :)
